results.title: Beloved
results.creator_credit: Daniel Zinkant, Elle Farnham, First Light and Suited & Booted Studios
results.brief_description: Through the main protagonist Dave, we hear and see what it is like to be in love and have those feelings trapped inside. As we are let into Dave’s world, we see him and a group of friends as they leave school and embark on their journey home. The film flicks between two worlds of fantasy and real-life as the journey progresses. As the narrative comes to an end, we watch the three friends depart and Dave is left alone. His love unknown, unsaid but only understood by the viewer.

results.title: The Voorman Problem
results.creator_credit: Mark Gill, Baldwin Li, Alastair Connolly and Honlodge
results.brief_description: Doctor Williams, a psychiatrist, is called to a prison to examine Voorman – an inmate with a peculiar affliction – he believes he is a god. The problem is, though, that he’s managed to convince the rest of the prison population that he is indeed telling the truth.

results.title: Two and Two
results.creator_credit: Babak Anvari, Anthony Bairstow, Kit Fraser and Flick Art
results.brief_description: In a school governed by a strict regime, the pupils are informed that what they had always been taught as fact is no longer true. But when the incredulous students speak out, they are forced to question how far they will go to stand up for their beliefs.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Babak Anvari, Anthony Bairstow, Kit Fraser and Flick Art

results.title: Tumult
results.creator_credit: Johnny Barrington, Maya Maffioli, Rhianna Andrews, Channel 4 Television, Creative Scotland and Young Films (UK)
results.brief_description: A tribe of Norse warriors traipse across a barren land after battle. Bloodied and wounded, their chief is near death. He is about to hand over power to his son when a completely different kind of army descend upon them.

results.title: Only Sound Remains
results.creator_credit: Arash Ashtiani, Aliocha Allard, Pierre-Alain Giraud, Anshu Poddar and London Film School
results.brief_description: In the wake of the violent post-election protests in Iran, a man and his wife, Babak and Nahid, try to hide the devastating news from Babak’s grandmother that his brother is missing.

results.title: Mwansa the Great
results.creator_credit: Rungano Nyoni, Gabriel Gauchet, ICreateFilms and UK Film Council
results.brief_description: A little boy sees himself as ‘Mwansa the great’, a full-grown warrior hunting lions. His little sister also visualises herself as an adult, ‘Princess Shula’ who is responsible for disciplining and looking after Mwansa.

results.title: Here to Fall
results.creator_credit: Kris Kelly, Jim Agnew, Evelyn McGrath, Arts Council (Ireland), Blacknorth and Irish Film Board
results.brief_description: A girl falls through darkness. A signal is broadcast, it’s a call. City wires connect and vibrate. The digital signal holds her, dropping her to a city’s rooftops that builds around her. She recognises it, and she’s safe, but for how long?
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kris Kelly, Jim Agnew, Evelyn McGrath, Arts Council (Ireland), Blacknorth and Irish Film Board
